    <script>
        // Page navigation functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Show dashboard by default
            showPage('dashboard-page');
            
            // Set active nav link
            setActiveNav('dashboard');
            
            // Add event listeners to all nav links
            document.querySelectorAll('a[data-page]').forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    const pageName = this.getAttribute('data-page');
                    showPage(pageName + '-page');
                    setActiveNav(pageName);
                });
            });
        });
        
        function showPage(pageId) {
            // Hide all pages
            document.querySelectorAll('.page').forEach(page => {
                page.classList.add('hidden');
            });
            
            // Show the requested page
            document.getElementById(pageId).classList.remove('hidden');
            
            // Scroll to top
            window.scrollTo(0, 0);
        }
        
        function setActiveNav(pageName) {
            // Remove active class from all nav links
            document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link').forEach(link => {
                link.classList.remove('active');
            });
            
            // Add active class to current nav link
            const activeLink = document.querySelector(`.nav-link[data-page="${pageName}"]`);
            if (activeLink) {
                activeLink.classList.add('active');
            }
        }
    </script>

  <script>
    // Page navigation functionality
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
      // Show dashboard by default
      showPage('dashboard-page');
      
      // Set active nav link
      setActiveNav('dashboard');
      
      // Add event listeners to all nav links
      document.querySelectorAll('a[data-page]').forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          const pageName = this.getAttribute('data-page');
          showPage(pageName + '-page');
          setActiveNav(pageName);
        });
      });
      
      // Add event listener to profile avatar
      document.querySelector('.avatar').closest('div').addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        showPage('profile-page');
        setActiveNav('profile');
      });
      
      // Set today's date as default
      const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
      document.querySelector('input[type="date"]').value = today;
    });
    
    function showPage(pageId) {
      // Hide all pages
      document.querySelectorAll('.page').forEach(page => {
        page.classList.add('hidden');
      });
      
      // Show the requested page
      document.getElementById(pageId).classList.remove('hidden');
      
      // Scroll to top
      window.scrollTo(0, 0);
    }
    
    function setActiveNav(pageName) {
      // Remove active class from all nav links
      document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link').forEach(link => {
        link.classList.remove('active');
      });
      
      // Add active class to current nav link
      const activeLink = document.querySelector(`.nav-link[data-page="${pageName}"]`);
      if (activeLink) {
        activeLink.classList.add('active');
      }
    }
    
    function filterChildren() {
      const input = document.getElementById('searchInput').value.toLowerCase();
      const childrenCards = document.querySelectorAll('.child-card');
      
      childrenCards.forEach(card => {
        const name = card.querySelector('.child-name').textContent.toLowerCase();
        if (name.includes(input)) {
          card.style.display = '';
        } else {
          card.style.display = 'none';
        }
      });
    }
    
    function fillChildName(name) {
      document.getElementById('childName').value = name;
      document.getElementById('childName').focus();
      document.querySelector('.report-form').scrollIntoView({behavior: 'smooth'});
    }
  </script>

    <script>
        // Page navigation functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Show dashboard by default
            showPage('dashboard-page');
            
            // Set active nav link
            setActiveNav('dashboard');
            
            // Add event listeners to all nav links
            document.querySelectorAll('a[data-page]').forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    const pageName = this.getAttribute('data-page');
                    if (pageName === 'babysitters') {
                        showPage('dashboard-page'); // We're already on the babysitters list
                    } else {
                        showPage(pageName + '-page');
                    }
                    setActiveNav(pageName);
                });
            });
            
            // Add event listeners to view buttons in babysitter table
            document.querySelectorAll('button:has(.fa-eye)').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    showPage('babysitter-detail-page');
                    setActiveNav('babysitters');
                });
            });
        });
        
        function showPage(pageId) {
            // Hide all pages
            document.querySelectorAll('.page').forEach(page => {
                page.classList.add('hidden');
            });
            
            // Show the requested page
            document.getElementById(pageId).classList.remove('hidden');
            
            // Scroll to top
            window.scrollTo(0, 0);
        }
        
        function setActiveNav(pageName) {
            // Remove active class from all nav links
            document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link').forEach(link => {
                link.classList.remove('active');
            });
            
            // Add active class to current nav link
            const activeLink = document.querySelector(`.nav-link[data-page="${pageName}"]`);
            if (activeLink) {
                activeLink.classList.add('active');
            }
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

  <script>
    // Page navigation functionality
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
      // Show dashboard by default
      showPage('dashboard-page');
      
      // Set active nav link
      setActiveNav('dashboard');
      
      // Add event listeners to all nav links
      document.querySelectorAll('a[data-page]').forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          const pageName = this.getAttribute('data-page');
          showPage(pageName + '-page');
          setActiveNav(pageName);
        });
      });
      
      // Photo filter functionality
      document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn').forEach(btn => {
        btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
          // Remove active class from all buttons
          document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn').forEach(b => {
            b.classList.remove('active');
            b.classList.remove('bg-purple-500', 'text-white');
            b.classList.add('bg-purple-100', 'text-purple-700');
          });
          
          // Add active class to clicked button
          this.classList.add('active', 'bg-purple-500', 'text-white');
          this.classList.remove('bg-purple-100', 'text-purple-700');
          
          const filter = this.getAttribute('data-filter');
          filterPhotos(filter);
        });
      });
      
      // Set "All Photos" as active by default
      document.querySelector('.filter-btn[data-filter="all"]').classList.add('active', 'bg-purple-500', 'text-white');
    });
    
    function showPage(pageId) {
      // Hide all pages
      document.querySelectorAll('.page').forEach(page => {
        page.classList.add('hidden');
      });
      
      // Show the requested page
      document.getElementById(pageId).classList.remove('hidden');
    }
    
    function setActiveNav(pageName) {
      // Remove active class from all nav links
      document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link').forEach(link => {
        link.parentElement.classList.remove('active-page');
      });
      
      // Add active class to current nav link
      const activeLink = document.querySelector(`.nav-link[data-page="${pageName}"]`);
      if (activeLink) {
        activeLink.parentElement.classList.add('active-page');
      }
    }
    
    function filterPhotos(filter) {
      const photos = document.querySelectorAll('.photo-container');
      
      photos.forEach(photo => {
        if (filter === 'all') {
          photo.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
          const categories = photo.getAttribute('data-category').split(' ');
          if (categories.includes(filter)) {
            photo.style.display = 'block';
          } else {
            photo.style.display = 'none';
          }
        }
      });
    }
  </script>
